title: How to Draven

embed.description: Step 1: Be Draven Step 2: cash in stacks Step 3: Draven After seeing foxneSs; 'How to Nasus' and 'Red neck Nasus', this had to be done.

body: Thanks to FoxneSs for inspiring me to do it with how to nasus and red neck nasus :D

replies.body: how can you say that!?!? you even have draven as your face. you obvs are draven.
As a draven main, I feel this on a spiritual level {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}
you and me both. I thoroughly enjoyed cashing 600 stacks.
